actions

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
      • actions.Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FairScheduler, SequentialScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler
extends Action
    Scheduler is an abstract class representing a scheduler, which is a list of actions to be done in a to-be-determined order.

    It contains the principles of the Scheduler in our implementation of the pool problem.

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn

      Constructors
